name: Birb (torkut)
description:
Use arrows to navigate Birb through the maze and get to her friends.

TODO: We will add automatic maze generation in the future, so every run you'll have a new maze.

This game was written during Spring Lisp Game Jam 2021 using Chickadee game development toolkit for Guile Scheme. The arts are my own and the audio is by Rick Hoppmann (TinyWorlds). 

Source code https://github.com/kierros/birb
